content: प्रशंस् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To praise, extol, approve, speak approvingly of, commend; हरिणा युवतिः प्रशशंसे <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; यच्च बाचा प्रशस्यते <ls>Ms. 5. 127</ls>; प्राशंसीत्तं निशाचरः <ls>Bk. 15. 65</ls>; <ls>R. 5. 25</ls>; <ls n="R.">17. 36.</ls> {@--2@} To esteem, value. {@--3@} To declare.
